title: v1.6.2 Sync Architecture Cleanup
details:
In v1.6.2, BroadcastChannel was removed in favor of storage.onChanged for cross-tab sync. Key cleanup items:

1. Dead code removed from src/content.js:
   - _handleQuickTabStorageSync function
   - SYNC_QUICK_TAB_STATE_FROM_BACKGROUND message handler

2. BroadcastManager.js was deleted from src/features/quick-tabs/managers/

3. Test files must import BroadcastManager from tests/mocks/BroadcastManagerMock.js (not the old path)

4. scenario-08-container-grouping.test.js deleted - container isolation removed in v1.6.2.2

5. Extension-test-utils waitForBroadcastSync renamed to _waitForStorageSync
